content: Like any good government official, John tells us to not question an institution’s “rightness” or “goodness.” How are we to ensure that anything is “right” or “good” (vague, relative terms), if we do not continually question and evaluate it? the7th.us has a way: Make it stop! The Echo is Killing Us.Why is it so difficult to tell where people really stand in an era where we have unprecedented internet access? At…medium.com Like and follow us, please (not you John Mccain)
